reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found an ad for this motel in the Roomsaver motel book we got at a visitor center. The ad was a room for $39.99 - no mention of how many people. When I checked in, the clerk said there was a mistake in the ad, that the rate was $49.99. I decided to stay because we were tired - big mistake.
reviews.title: Ripoff - a bait and switch

reviews.text: The bed was lunpy, dirty carpet, the air conditioner was very loud, ice machine did not work very well, the clerk was rude. We were in Colorado Springs several days and the next day we searched for another motel. Just down the street was a very nice independant motel - the Stagecoach Motel - very nice - for $39 a night.
reviews.title: Great place to stay .
The name of this motel should be "Oasis" as it was that for us, a pleasant retreat on our journey.
reviews.text: I would recommend staying at the motel to anyone I know. The staff is very kind, and always freindly . It is in a very convient location ,close to reastaraunts , shopping, and atms. Our room was very clean , they had just carpet cleaned it before we checked in.
The bed was very comfy ,and the rooms are very spacious,well worth the money.
reviews.title: Free Live Entertainment, upgrade to the "delux"...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed here several times ,and will do so again.It is very peaceful ,and we had a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Unexpected Suprises!

reviews.text: Don't stay here if you want a good night sleep. I was here just one night on a road trip, so I just wanted to rest up and get back on the road. Well, that didn't happen! First off, the light switch didn't work and only one lamp in the entire room worked. The wall outlet near the beds where the lamps were plugged in didn't work either. Also the light in the bathroom didn't work. Secondly, the flimsy bed the had had no support and the bedding keep coming off the mattrees as I sleep. Finally, the heater was a joke. The thing didn't regulate the air at all. Either it was too hot or too cold; no in between. Bad experience here.
reviews.title: Beds were horrible

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel was in a bad area of town, unsavary people walking the grounds and the street. . Room OK, bathroom undesireable. They advertise wi-fi for all rooms. Don't believe it. It didn't work in our room and when the office was called they said wi-fi wouldn't work that far back...9 rroms from the office. Went to the office to use internet there, Internet not in working order but the staff computer was up and running, which guests cannot use. The staff did nothing to help resolve the problem.
reviews.title: Dont stay here!

reviews.text: One highligth of staying there...The German restaurant Edelweiss has great German food, prices were moderate and the service was great!
reviews.title: Old apartment buildings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed two nights. We had a suite, which I think might have been an old apartment building. Floor was old. Furniture was old but comfy. Bathroom was tiny and smelled mildewy at times. The bedroom was big and the window overlooked a trailer park. Both TVs worked but only one remote did. There was a micro/fridge with leftover milk and juice from the people before us. The room was kept pretty clean and decent. There was an outlet for a dryer. Pool was kept up nice, we didn't go in it because it was too cold, but it looked good enough. VERY friendly staff. Loved everyone I talked to. Parking was weird, the building we stayed in had parking on the other side of it, the side facing the trailer park, and there's only one way in and out of the motel so if someone's coming in you might as well have to back up until they drive past the lobby, then you can get out. Location was decent, close to alot of fast food. It took about 15 minutes to get to Manitou/Cascade area. Decent stay but next time we will stay elsewhere.
reviews.title: A place to stay

likes.liked: — A place to stay without breaking the bank
likes.disliked: — Location, in older part of town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well, this hotel is an older one, but has been redone to a point. The price was right and seemed to be the only room in town at the time with out breaking the bank. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet, this is all I needed after a 16hr. drive. Don't know if I would stay here again if something else is avalable.
reviews.title: Quick One-Night Stay

likes.disliked: — The other guests staying at the hotel...creepy.

reviews.title: avoid this hotel
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for just one night, as a stop-over during a long road trip. We literally checked in, went to sleep, woke up and showered and left early the next morning.

We booked this place ahead of time over the phone. When we checked in, we found out there is some deal you can get for $40 a night--we paid almost twice that--which made us feel a little ripped off. There is a apparently a newer, stand alone tall building to this hotel next to the older section we stayed in. The older place is okay. It had a little dorm size square ice box--no microwave. We could use the internet fine for free. It seemed pretty clean and everything worked. As far as safety--we felt okay. There were a lot of people staying there. It looked like an older area, near the freeway. Breakfast was the usual continental--plus hard boiled eggs. Location was really great--convenient to the places we wanted to go--Canon City, Pike's Peak, Garden of the Gods, etc.!! Staff could use a little improvement--but it was fine for two nights for us.
reviews.title: Okay, average

reviews.text: The motel is located in the suburbs. It is not a business district or even an area with glitzy hotel towers. It is clean, comfortable, and safe. The patrons run the full spectrum from families, to businessmen, to bikers out on a road trip.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable, and Safe

reviews.text: The rooms were a bit worn, but very comfortable. Plenty of hot water and while the motel was a bit dated, everyone got a great night's sleep.
reviews.title: Heed the reviews...this place is a dump.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Big Mistake

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Background: This review is based upon the following criteria. Our family, two adults and three kids (12, 7, & 7) took a 6-week cross country road trip. We stayed at over 30 motels and ate in dozens of resturaunts. This review was written a month after coming home to give me time to put everything into perspective. I hope it helps, I know how much the reviews on this site helped us.
reviews.title: Sleeping in the suburbs
